title: Is the world becoming more homogeneous? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not 100% sure what the question is aimed at, but in a way we can say, yes the world is becoming more homogenous. After all we evolved into a globally interconnected and interdependent human society which itself is integral part of a fully interconnected and interdependent vast, cosmic, natural system. On the other hand we human beings are not homogenous at all. We are all born as proud, unique individuals, fiercely guarding our independence, self-esteem and presumed freedom. Thus the task ahead of us is learning how such unique, individualistic people can mutually, positively interconnect, comprising a multi-committed, multi-faceted single human “mosaic", “harmonious orchestra” where each can contribute with their unique, individual attributes, talents to the magnificence of the whole collective. The World Is A Harmonious Orchestra | Laitman.com
